a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Intensity error, East Northern Pacific Basin Tropical Cyclones, 1990 to 2017
Average forecasting error of the intensity of hurricanes and tropical cyclones from 24 hours to 120 hours in advance.
Intensity error is measured in knots.
Data source: NHC, Hurricane Forecasting Error (2019)
